==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Perzent}} * {{l|de|Percent}}, {{l|de|per Centum}}, {{l|de|per Cento}} {{qualifier|obsolete}} * {{l|de|Procent}}, {{l|de|pro Cent}}, {{l|de|pro Centum}}, {{l|de|pro Cento}}, {{l|de|pro cento}} {{qualifier|obsolete}} * {{l|de|Prct.}}, {{l|de|pCt.}}, {{l|de|prCt.}} {{qualifier|abbreviation; obsolete}} * {{l|de|%}} ===Etymology=== From {{bor|de|it|per cento}}, from {{m+|la|per||through, by}} and {{m|la|centum||hundred}}, modified by the influence of {{m+|la|pro||for}} or {{m+|de|pro}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/pʁoˈt͡sɛnt/}} * {{audio|de|De-Prozent.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n|Prozents|gen2=Prozentes|Prozente}} # [[percent]] #* '''2010''', ''[[w:Der Spiegel|Der Spiegel]]'', issue [http://www.spiegel.de/spiegel/print/index-2010-2.html 2/2010], page 125: #*: Kohlendioxid trägt durch seine Menge mehr als jedes andere Treibhausgas zum Klimawandel bei, doch seine Konzentration in der Luft beträgt weniger als 0,04 '''Prozent'''. #*:: Carbon dioxide contributes by its amount more than any other greenhouse gas to climate change, but its concentration in the air is less than 0.04 percent. ====Usage notes==== The plural ''Prozente'' is only used to mean different percent values or percentages: ''„Was sind die genauen Prozente für A und B?“'' "What are the exact percentages of A and B?" Otherwise, like in English, the singular is used: ''fünfzig Prozent'' "fifty percent". ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|(e)s|e}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|Hundertstel}} * {{l|de|vom Hundert}} * {{l|de|von Hundert}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|-prozentig}} * {{l|de|prozentisch}} * {{l|de|prozentual}} * {{l|de|prozentualiter}} * {{l|de|prozentuell}} * {{l|de|Prozentpunkt}} * {{l|de|Prozentsatz}} * {{l|de|Prozentwert}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Promille}} * {{l|de|Permille}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/proˈt͡sɛnt/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=m}} # [[percent]] ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary]
